home.title: Hi, I'm Viola
home.description: I'm a Full Stack Web Developer

education.title: Education
education.university: I started programming at university, studying C++, Java, and PostgreSQL, while using Linux as my operating system; naturally, I also learned some bash. In addition, I studied algorithms and data structures.
education.EPICODE: At the beginning of 2025, I discovered EPICODE's Web Developer master, a six-month full-immersion program with live lessons covering both theory and practice. Each module included individual real-world projects, and at the end of each one we also had the opportunity to work in groups on additional projects, allowing us to develop our teamwork skills.
